meta.name: We The Hongkongers
meta.about:
We are HKers in the U.S committed to strengthening the Hongkonger identity and promoting the HK culture in the U.S.
我們致力於進一步在美國鞏固香港人的身份和宣揚香港獨特的文化。

meta.name: We The Hongkongers
meta.about:
We The Hongkongers is committed to strengthening the Hongkonger identity and promoting the Hong Kong culture among the communities in the U.S.

We devote to: 
01/ Social Impact
Assure the social significance and impact of the Hong Kong community to U.S. society.
02/ Identity
Instill pride in the Hongkonger identity among those living in the U.S.
03/ Culture
Preserve and promote the unique culture and history of Hong Kong.
04/ Coalition
Serve as a bridge between all generations of Hongkongers in the U.S. to develop a national coalition.
05/ Resistance
Instill pride in the Hongkonger identity among those living in the U.S.
06/ Global Support
Preserve and promote the unique culture and history of Hong Kong.
